name: UpdatePersistedFolder
description:
Update details of a persisted folder in a project.

Use this tool to update the details of a persisted folder within a specified project using the project and folder IDs.

parameters.name: persisted_folder_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the persisted folder to update.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve using /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the folder to update within the project.

parameters.name: folder_type
parameters.description: Specify the folder type: 'home' for Home or 'pinned' for Pinned.

parameters.name: folder_creation_date
parameters.description: The date when the folder was originally created, in string format. Use this to specify the creation timestamp for folder updates.

parameters.name: update_timestamp
parameters.description: Provide the timestamp when the folder was last updated. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-10-01T12:34:56Z').

parameters.name: update_protocol
parameters.description: Specify the protocol for the folder update. This value should be a string.

parameters.name: folder_path
parameters.description: Specify the path where the persisted folder is located within the project.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this Persisted Folder.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this Persisted Folder.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
